meanings.definition: A person or thing that increases.
meanings.sent1: The increasers of happiness in our lives are our loved ones.
meanings.sent2: We need more increasers like hard work and dedication to achieve success.
meanings.sent3: The increasers of laughter at the party were the funny jokes and silly games.
meanings.sent4: Kindness acts as an increaser of positivity in the world.
meanings.sent5: The sun is a natural increaser of warmth and light for the Earth.

meanings.sent1: The increasers in the room were all dedicated to their goals.
meanings.sent2: She counted the increasers in the basket and found there were ten.
meanings.sent3: The increasers on the shelf looked colorful and appealing.
meanings.sent4: The increasers on the team worked together to achieve great results.
meanings.sent5: The increasers in the garden were blooming flowers and growing vegetables.
